rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/alyosha?rev=1422491263">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-01-28T19:27:43-04:00</dc:date>         <title>alyosha</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/alyosha?rev=1422491263</link>         <description>Alexei Christian Paul  Le 11 novembre 2014, 10h03, New York.  *  Premi\ufffd\ufffdres photos</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/biography?rev=1426272745">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-03-13T14:52:25-04:00</dc:date>         <title>biography</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/biography?rev=1426272745</link>         <description>Biography    L\ufffd\ufffdon was born in 1965 in Saint Germain du Teil, Loz\ufffd\ufffdre near the Aubrac plateau. He spent his childhood in La Canourgue and attended school in Rodez and Clermont-Ferrand, then in \ufffd\ufffdcole Sainte Genevi\ufffd\ufffdve, Versailles. He received the Dipl\ufffd\ufffdme d'Ing\ufffd\ufffdnieur de l'\ufffd\ufffdcole Polytechnique (X84) in 1987,  the Magist\ufffd\ufffdre de Math\ufffd\ufffdmatiques Fondamentales et Appliqu\ufffd\ufffdes et d'Informatique from</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/cos424?rev=1409327081">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-08-29T11:44:41-04:00</dc:date>         <title>cos424</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/cos424?rev=1409327081</link>         <description>Are you looking for the 2010 cos424 pages ?</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/morenews?rev=1140543351">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2006-02-21T12:35:51-04:00</dc:date>         <title>morenews</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/morenews?rev=1140543351</link>         <description>More news</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/papers?rev=1422056151">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-01-23T18:35:51-04:00</dc:date>         <title>papers</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/papers?rev=1422056151</link>         <description>Publications  Follow each publication link to access papers and supplemental data.  Most papers are available in DjVu, PDF, and PS.GZ.  Download a DjVu viewer.  2014 L\ufffd\ufffdon Bottou:  Making Vapnik-Chervonenkis bounds accurate,  Measures of Complexity. Festschrift in honour of the 75th birthday of Professor Alexey Chervonenkis</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/projects?rev=1405110059">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-07-11T16:20:59-04:00</dc:date>         <title>projects</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/projects?rev=1405110059</link>         <description>Projects  Free software  Large software packages with a life of their own.   *  Lush: complete prototyping environment.  *  TL3: very compact lisp interpreter.  *  DjVuLibre: free implementation of DjVu.  *  Crasm: cross assembler for 8 bit processors.  *  Minilisp: a c++ library to handle lisp expressions.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/research?rev=1356361354">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-12-24T10:02:34-04:00</dc:date>         <title>research</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/research?rev=1356361354</link>         <description>Research  My main research interest involves statistical learning systems,  that is, computer programs able to learn relations between  certain data on the basis of a collection of examples.  My contributions include both theoretical  aspects and real-life applications.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/sidebar?rev=1331014661">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2012-03-06T01:17:41-04:00</dc:date>         <title>sidebar</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/sidebar?rev=1331014661</link>         <description>Contents   *  Home  *  Research  *  Publications  *  Talks  *  Projects  *  Vitae</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/sidebarhelp?rev=1157173473">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2006-09-02T01:04:33-04:00</dc:date>         <title>sidebarhelp</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/sidebarhelp?rev=1157173473</link>         <description>Help   *  DokuWiki  *  DokuWiki syntax  *  DokuWiki sandbox  Misc   *  Sidebar: sidebar  *  More sidebar: sidebarhelp</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/start?rev=1426271929">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-03-13T14:38:49-04:00</dc:date>         <title>start</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/start?rev=1426271929</link>         <description>Welcome    I am a research scientist with broad interests in practical and theoretical machine learning. My work on large scale learning and stochastic gradient algorithms has received attention in the recent years. I am also known for the DjVu document compression system. I joined Facebook AI Research in March 2015.  Use the sidebar to navigate this site.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://leon.bottou.org/talks?rev=1368989343">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2013-05-19T14:49:03-04:00</dc:date>         <title>talks</title>         <link>http://leon.bottou.org/talks?rev=1368989343</link>         <description>Talks  This page contains pointers to my most significant lectures.  All the slides are available under both the PDF and DjVu formats.   *  The BackPropagation CookBook  *  Graph Transformer Networks  *  DjVu: Scanned Documents on the Web  *  Online Learning and Stochastic Approximations  *  The Tradeoffs of Large Scale Learning  *  Stochastic Algorithms for One Pass Learning  *  Counterfactual Reasoning and Learning Systems</description>     </item> </rdf:RDF>
